website_summaries.verdict: A popular option for those wanting a simple, no-nonsense machine with top performance.
pros: LED lights are constructed into range hood
Option to purchase at 800 CFM or 900 CFM
Removable oil filter for easy cleaning
cons: Many customers had problems with the product's LED lights being either defective or too dim

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected or hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing my 450cfm hood and was really excited to get this hood at 900cfm. Very disappointed!! I read many reviews including one that said they cook Chinese food ( which can throw up a lot of smoke and steam) and the hood worked very well. As you can see from my video the immense pillow of smoke bellowing out of the hood. I have to open the windows all the time to clear the smoke... not happy, not impressed
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Hood!!
customer_reviews.text: The hood came without any dents or dings and looks great. It was really easy to install. I installed underneath a cabinet with the provided hardware. It also comes with hardware to attach it to the wall behind the unit. I cut through the cabinet and outside wall. FYI. This unit does not have a recirculate option and you need to vent it outside. It pulls a lot of air. I don't have any return air specifically for this unit but it still works great. I am able to stir fry at high temps or deep fry without smoking out the house!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Schrock

customer_reviews.title: RUSTED FILTERS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The filters started to rust. My wife and I are very disappointed with the product as they are not cheap to begin with plus the labor that we paid to install the hood. Now we are stuck with these rusted filters.
customer_reviews.author: Robam Official

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend against buying from them
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time. However, upon opening, we discovered that one of the light bulbs was not turning on. The defective LED is on the right side, light is barely visible. We tried to loosen it and tighten it again, then it turned on. So we installed the unit at our new house and moved on to other projects. When we finally moved in 3 weeks later, the same bulb was out again. Tried fixing it, didn't work. Contacted the seller to get a replacement bulb on July 18th. Nobody bothered responding to us. I would highly recommend against buying from them. Don't expect any warranty if something goes wrong with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Quick response
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of complaining about the lights, I received this reply from the manufacturer: "We actually have brighter lights for you to replace. The new light that we are sending you is twice bright as the existing one."
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this range hood. Its easy to use and does a fantastic job of moving smoke and odors to the outside. Even when we run it on high, it doesn't interfere with conversations.. I'm adding a picture in response to a question about covering this with a custom hood cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction. Flickering lights.
customer_reviews.text: Lights initially flicker and constantly go out. It does not appear to be due to a loose contact. The suction does not seem to be as impressive as advertised. In fact, near the edges you can feel the air blowing out thru the vents not sucking the air in. The metal vent filters are very flimsy and bent for no reason. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: I had it installed yesterday. here are three things ...
customer_reviews.text: I had it installed yesterday. here are three things. 1. The LED light was not that bright. 2. It did not have touch screen panel and clock show in the photo. 3.The product misses a screw on the front right end (I bought used from Amazon Warehouse). 4. After installation, the unit vibrates ( not big vibration but micro vibration. that increase the noise level when operation). I would return it. but it just too much effort to take it down. Also, Maybe the unit was an old model since it has a physical button instead of touch screen. the unit did not see that strong. 800CFM. I don't know if anyone tests it.
customer_reviews.author: You Rock

customer_reviews.title: looking nice in my new renovated kitchen but removal of wrapper was labor intensive and dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a sometime researching for suitable and aesthetically undercabinet hood vent. I finally picked BV hi airflow. Just had it installed professionally. so far so good will need more time when my kitchen up and running. Updating the above comment. The white plastic wrap covering the baffles both sides of each baffle. IT was really hard to remove those plastic. They were so tightly attached. I had to spend 3 hours trying to remove them! Was advised to open each baffle to facilitate removal. Beware the edges because they are not smooth hence got bloodied fingers. Not good at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: YSW

customer_reviews.title: Something must be wrong
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: BV have accepted the product for return. I am happy with the service and will update this review again after they let me know what was wrong. I have just installed this unit and there's gotta be something wrong. It barely moves air. I followed the directions and removed the packing etc. Maybe I got a lemon. Pretty disappointed that I let the return window expire...
customer_reviews.author: A. Bearlin

customer_reviews.title: Good features, Bad QC.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three exhaust fans (two from BV) in my attempt to find an more economical alternative to some ludicrously priced fans sold locally (Pacific / Sanyangpai / Pac-Air / Sakura). These options start at over half a grand for the basic models and run into the four digits. Unfortunately both BV products I've ordered I've also returned. This product checked all the boxes in terms of functionality, high CFM, stainless, "Euro" design removable grills, led lights, the works. However on receipt one of the three "removable" grills could not be removed as it would not unlatch. The two star rating is due to quality control, as the other BV fan had an unbalanced fan which grated against its housing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C

customer_reviews.title: Received a returned item instead of a brand new item.
customer_reviews.text: I have received the product as it was promised. I installation was fine. After installation was done I realized that the range hood isn’t brand new like it was promised. The filters normally has blue plastic tape wrapped, this one didn’t. Small piece of blue tape was intact. It was a return item from another customer. After I installed it thats when I noticed it. Very disappointed. I paid for new items, not a returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Yeahya Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Installation could be improved if ......
customer_reviews.text: Like the rangehood so far, perfect for asian cooking. 4 stars because rangehood is heavy and it was difficult for one person to hold it while other marked pilot holes. If a paper layout, same size as rangehood could be provided it will eliminate the need to hold the hood in place for pilot hole markings. Also I did not use the screws and anchors but used 1/4 inch bolt and nut with washer for stability and robustness.
customer_reviews.author: Thakur Sahab

customer_reviews.title: Best Range Hood I Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is way better than my old one. It comes in well package, very secure and very easy to install. It is very powerful!! It helps to move all the smoke in the kitchen while I am cooking. Also, it is soooo quiet in the quiet mode. The light is bright enough as well. It is very well made and looks good in our kitchen. Overall, it is the best deal that I got from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally clean fresh living room
customer_reviews.text: The wife is finally happay and No more stinky living room. After reading all the reviews I decided to give this BV a try and was happy of the outcome. Installation was easy took about 2 hrs by myself. The unit is very quiet even at the highest setting. I am able to listen to the tv. We have an open concept kitchen dinning room and the unit is able to keep the dinning room smell clean and fresh even when deep fried meat and fish. Worth every pennies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to remove the sticky residue from the front sticker ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan came carefully packaged free from dents and blemishes. It installed easily but you need two people the unit is heavy. It has great suction and is quiet. I'd like if the bulbs were brighter but they still are good. Now the secret for removing the sticky goo left from the sticker on the front of the hood: WD-40. It easily removes the residue and is what I use to clean my stainless steel. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Inct

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. The fans are becoming more noisy with time, especially in the lower suction button position. It was tricky to install this hood and my stove seems to stick out more from the wall, therefore the suction from the fans is not aligned to properly suck the fumes when cooking. When the air conditioner is on in the summer, in my kitchen window, it blows the steam towards the fans and the hood sucks in the steam a little better. Was shocked to hear that when the lights burn out, you can not replace them with new ones. The bulbs are permanent and once they burn out, you will not be able to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made/excellent flow
customer_reviews.text: This report is after 3 months of use. I am very pleased with the product. Hood is exceptionally well made, excellent craftmanship and attention to detail in fabrication. LEDs lights give off plenty of light and on high setting the vacuum is very strong-nothing is getting away. Is it a bit loud? Yes (on high setting) but I prioritized CFM over noise. -**Just went in to clean the filters for the first time and not paying attention, I slide my finger into the filter into an an area not meant for figure and gave myself a nice "paper cut"-which lead me to write this review. Great hood, just be careful when cleaning the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy :)

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not good enough
customer_reviews.text: The fans seemed to move a lot of air but when I finally got it installed it didn't pull anything, (steam or smoke) from the front burners. Construction seemed to be sturdy and if it was a little closer to a lesser stove it would probably work better. Also if your not deep frying, stir frying or cooking with a lot of heat I guess it would suit you. My wife and I do a lot of serious cooking with a pretty strong gass stove and a lot of heat! So if your more of a casual cook this might suit your needs but if you want something serious keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Emmameboomama

customer_reviews.title: It's a Beast / Odor Mover
customer_reviews.text: This thing Moves Some Exhaust. Great improvement over the one I replaced. No more Cooking Smells. The only thing that would be better if the Light had a Brighter setting, like a low & High. That aside, it's a Real good Buy
customer_reviews.author: lil'Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of strength lights and air movement- took wok smoke at the med. speed!
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, great price, great power! Should have had the needed mounting screws, but we are DIY people , so we had extras. Also on a different model they sugested a coupling this one didn't and should have told you that a conversion coupling might be needed. It is always hard to do these things and working upside down proved to be a little difficult especially where the screws needed to be placed. Overall ver happy, arrived in great condition super strong anti scratch covering.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Heitman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value pro style range hood
customer_reviews.text: Finally, we can run the fan in the kitchen and carry on a conversation like civilized people! This thing does it's job well and is not loud like a vacuum cleaner (in comparison to our microwave fan before). It looks very professional and we get a lot of compliments on it from visitors. Well worth the money! On the first night we installed it, the wife cooked mexican style chicken, which usually smells up the whole house, but to our amazement, we didn't smell anything in any of the other rooms using this vent, so mission accomplished! The only slight complaint is the LED lighting is too harsh. Otherwise, this thing is great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lott

customer_reviews.title: not easy to disassemble and reassemble
customer_reviews.text: I disassembled fan blades and drip channels to make hood lighter to install. The fan lug nuts were too tight, I needed to use pliers and a rag to remove nut. When reassembling the fan blades, they are not marked left and right. I hope I put them back correctly. Fan blades are not easy to reinstall on spindle, I needed to put axle grease on spindle to slide on. Very frustrating. Fans suck the fumes from stove very well, but they are very noisy, the price you pay for lots of air movement.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: About half as noisy as a Kenmore microwave vent and about 2-3 times more efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and works great. Ours is Indian cooking that is fish heavy. No odors in the house anymore. Installed it myself by removing the microwave and planning it in that location. The 6" vent runs about 3ft up, bends 90 degrees and runs 6ft to vent outside. Materials were from home Depot and costed about $60 roughly. Mostly use it at the high setting, but can still have a conversation with someone in the kitchen without having to shout, unlike when we had the microwave vent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Fan has good functionality but the light might as well not be there. called number provided requesting a brighter light. Joey said I can return the item as no other light was available. He knows of the issue as many others have complained as well. Until they get this issue fixed, I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a Dent
customer_reviews.text: I received the rangehood today and inspected it immediately due to the large number of reviews that indicated theirs arrived dented/damaged. The front logo displayed BV and everything almost looked good but there was a dent in the front and the stainless steel looked dull and dusty in some areas. I've initiated the return but do not have faith in Amazon's return process and they've already taken over 2 months to process a previous return. Not sure I plan to re-order this same hood as I'm worried the next one will arrive damaged as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Had this vent installed and found the hardest part to be peeling the protective white tape off the baffles. The instructions are not the best in terms of telling you exactly what type of ductwork to use. Whether to use aluminum crimped edges or smooth connectors etc. The vent operation itself is okay. We do a lot of stir fries and sous vide searing and this hood does not seem to capture the smells which defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Webuser

customer_reviews.title: not an easy install....
customer_reviews.text: excellent unit but difficult to install.... takes two people.... had to use my auto mechanic pneumatic air tool due to the lack of space to mount overhead.... definitely pre-drill your mounting holes carefully and center the unit, which is heavy! Hope this unit lasts so I do not have to take it out for any reason...
customer_reviews.author: douglas

customer_reviews.title: Very quite range hood
customer_reviews.text: Only had this range hood for a little over a week but so far working great. Light is adequate for cooking and wish it came with a way to dim the light. Quiet mode on fan has good suction power and you can hardly tell it is on. High speed is great and noise level below most of the range hoods we have had in the past with no where near the same power. Keeping my house from cooking smells as well as dealing with the heat of the stove/oven.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid, and quiet by comparison to previous "quiet" range hoods I likely will rarely need the highest setting. Note that wall OR cabinet mount needed. Replace install screws with toggle screws for drywall. I also used these for the through-cabinet upper mount, but threading is tricky - use wing nuts washers top and bottom. Because of the design while the hood seems large at first, it looks great with SS range below. Elegant. Had a little confusion with the documentation (reportedly reworking) but customer service responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: mbon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design - just pushes air out front
customer_reviews.text: I really don't understand how this range hood is so highly rated. It may move 900 cfm, but due to it's horrible design it doesn't move the air into the duct... it just pushes it out the front. It is absolutely worthless and I sincerely regret wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. Comes pre wired with grounded AC plug. Quiet and very functional. 6" venting required. Cons: LED light not as bright, annoying beeping sound (you can disable the sound by removing the sonic alarm located in the center of the board or just cover the hole with a piece of electrical tape)
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor fan durability
customer_reviews.text: Overall performance is great, installation is easy, but fan durability is not as great for such a nice product. I got annoying humming sound on the right side of the hood just after a couple of weeks of installation. It’s fan base got misaligned and causing the noise. Got it fixed with a level and screwdriver. It works great now. I am happy with this product but taking 1 star off because of the issue I faced.
customer_reviews.author: Gyanesh S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only a few months of light use.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had made the right choice with this fan until it just stopped working - lights, fans, everything. I tested the circuit, I plugged it in to other outlets, and no luck. Support for the product through amazon ended literally days before the issue began.
customer_reviews.author: Padraic Markle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to go above our gas stove in the kitchen. Installation was a little tricky for us as the diameter of the exhaust pipe in our home was not the same size as the one on the range hood We were able to adapt and install. The price for this is well worthwhile. The exhaust fan does extremely well on all settings, easily pulling smoke and smells out, even on low. It was heavier than we expected, but well made. It definitely meets our expectations so far, will amend later after more use if needed. Thankful we found this one as it definitely meets and exceeds our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. For the 800 CFM it's not noisy as the other people complained. You have to remember the noise/vibration comes from improperly installed unit or air leak or... I had unusual open kitchen situation with the stove in the middle of the room. So i had to be a little bit creative to get going (See picture) But i have all installed well. Even with the multiple bends it works great.
customer_reviews.author: KepkaI:-)

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD VIBRATION
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered with scratches dent on top side which tells me it ma have been dropped. Also very loud vibration at all speeds. Fume evacuation very inefficient whereas it only catches back burners of stove
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good Hood
customer_reviews.text: Got it installed a month ago and so far it's working great. Hood was very well packaged and came with all kinds of hardware what is needed for mounting. This can be installed for rear and top vent out which is one of the reasons I purchased it and you definitely need two people when you are mounting! Pros: Suction power and look of the hood. Cons: Noise level is higher than what I expected. Touch screen is not the best. Sometime I have to tap on it multiple times to power on or to increase/decrease the fan level.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Looks good works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great super powerful fan...the only thing to note was how heavy the overall unit was, definitely a two man install! Once installed the unit works great has a nice brushed stainless design and very clean bright LEDs to light up anything underneath! I would buy again but I have a feeling with the quality of the unit I may never have to!
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Not 36 inches
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, this hood is not 36 inches. I did not bother reading the specs as it is advertised as a 36 inch hood. The actually width is 35 inch and so I now have a gap between the hood and the cabinets on both sides. That was quite disappointing. Suction power seems mediocre. I can't really say as I don't have another brand to compare to. At max speed, It just barely holds up a napkin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Husband installed . But it comes with no directions or bolts . But my husband is handy so it didn’t effect us. Very good quality. Nice ! We’re happy !
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: 800 CFM... Can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a hood range with high CFM this is it. Easy to clean, LED lights, multiple speeds and 800 CFMs. Did I mention that it is also pretty quite? I researched quite a bit of hood ranges. Most ranges at Home Depot, Sears, etc only produce 350-400 CFMs... Weak! You still going to smell the fried fish for 3 more days in your kitchen. You want some muscle hanging over your range? Then get this one! Don't delay! This is hood range screams 'Murica! Got lots of compliments of it on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Is made of cheap stainless steel. Blower seems to be strong enough.
customer_reviews.text: Received mine today. First thing I did is open the box and connect it to see if it works. First thing I noticed is that it is made of cheap stainless steel. Magnets adhere to it and it is a fingerprint magnet too. It works and seems to be good but the filters don't seem to be good quality. I have to wait a few weeks before installation and after that I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Calebguada

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vent hood
customer_reviews.text: This does everything it’s supposed to. I have two units; one for rack of my houses. I never review anything in less than one year. I’ve had one of my units for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Wine

customer_reviews.title: No more setting of smoke detectors!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy amount of power! I am now able to cook at full heat without setting off the smoke alarms! Definitely opened up a whole new world of cooking not having to worry about smoke!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Fans blow backwards
customer_reviews.text: I had used this for 6 months now and recently realized that the fans don't really suck in the smoke from the stove but blow it backwards. We have an intake to which the range hood is connected and the range hood fans are supposed to suck in the smoke - am I not correct?
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this installed in my house for a few months now and it is really quite good. Run quiet, moves a lot of air and seems well built. Comes with a funny warning sticker, "Please take down the foams while using." It wasn't immediately clear what this meant, but it means that there is styrofoam blocks wedged into the fans inside the range hood. I turned it on and grinded the "foams" into the fans the first time I turned it on. Bottom line: I was skeptical of this brand I didn't know but it seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced Blades
customer_reviews.text: Item came well packaged. Installation was easy but it vibrates a lot. On hand spinning the turbine blades you can see them swaying all over place, of course, the reason for the vibration. Wished to return it but didn't want the hassle of having to take it down and re- install a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Not usable at all.
customer_reviews.text: It's dented so badly that you can't even open the filter. The grease collector can't be installed due to the damaged clip in the fifth picture. There are multiple broken parts. Absolutely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Bolda Abul

customer_reviews.title: Finally I decided to keep it anyway since fortunately that side I see less often
customer_reviews.text: The item itself (sheet metal) arrived damaged on one side. One side is completely flat, the other is showing some bent metal around the front corner next to welding points. Finally I decided to keep it anyway since fortunately that side I see less often. Other than the cosmetics, the vents and lights are working great!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The hood delivered without damage and complete set of hardware except some of the hardware were useless for us due to different mounting
customer_reviews.text: It is a very positive experience overall. The hood delivered without damage and complete set of hardware except some of the hardware were useless for us due to different mounting. The video helps to prepare us for the installation. The fan operates relatively quiet and less noisy than our previous hood from Sears (Kenmore). The LED lights is a plus with very good lumination.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range hood
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality range hood that will exceed your overhead exhaust needs for a 30 inch gas or electric range. It is heavy duty, with no sharp corners or edges. Shipping was fast and the unit was packaged/protected very well. Highly satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The unit looks very good runs very quietly for a high power fan
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks very good runs very quietly for a high power fan. I used a 7" duct. The mfg. should supply a template to be used for locating the screws to hold unit in place. I took the time to make a template and it worked out well. There were some spelling and grammar mistakes in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: glenn f richards

customer_reviews.title: Not recoment to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Too much noise,sucklevel not good,every time I fry my house a larm on because they don’t suck all the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Range hood in the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best range hood we owned so far. it sucks almost every bad smell and keeps your home air clean. We are Indians and we do a hell lot of cooking. This beast takes out all the smoke. Recommended to every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sanju

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Received with damaged dented body. Nail holes not even properly aligned. Came with no screws and no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Khan

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked to see the mounting holes a bit easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: This performed well, seemed to get a lot of the smell outside. Kinda loud but thats expected because of the amount of airflow. I would have liked to see the mounting holes a bit easier to access. The etched logo is a bit cheap looking and the stainless material could have looked a bit more upscale. Other than cosmetic, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: J. DANG

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Louder than I like. I purchased for the high cfm value. It's better than the systems on microwaves, but doesn't remove all cooking smells as I had liked. I think the material is not high quality. It's thin.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne in FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect range hood
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this purchase, we have been using it for a couple of months now. It is so much more quiet than our old one and the light works very well. The fan looks good installed and works perfectly with strong suction. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fan is powerful, LED light is bright, install was easy
customer_reviews.text: Fan is powerful, LED light is bright, install was easy. Only complaint is the hood fan 1/4" narrower than my kitchen cabinet. Because my existing cabinet is lower than the new hood fan on both sides I had to put in a filler piece of wood to fill the gap.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to install it. Turns out it dis not come with a 6inxh connector to where the exhaust is on it. Cannot connect the duct to it with out it. :/ so disoppointed. Tried twice but failed. Now I have to buy one and work on it tomorrow AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Mounis M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: The 900 cfm is totally useless, the design only covers half of the stove, I think they don’t know the size of 30’’ stoves when they made this Range hood.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Chen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vent, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60" existing hood cover I wanted to repurpose. These two hood vents fit perfectly and work amazing. Excellent light and really likely the 2 minute auto-off timer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works GREAT, though 3 days after installing the hood
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works GREAT, though 3 days after installing the hood, one of the LED lights went out. I called their cust svc and they had 2 new ones shipped to me within 2 days! Very happy with the product and the Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Singh

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t have the problems that were reported on previous reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews. With some hesitation regarding the reports of fan noise/bent blades and dim lighting I bought the range hood. Without fully pulling the hood out of the box, I plugged it in and tested the fan speeds and the light. Fan ran smoothly on all speeds and the light was brighter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: matthew  kelly

customer_reviews.title: No smoke, smell or steam escapes this beast
customer_reviews.text: The BV range hood is a little loud but I'll take the trade off for it's great ability to move a lot of air. No smoke, smell or steam escapes this beast. As others noted the lights are a little dim but our kitchen is well lit so we don't really notice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good venting. Thin stainless steal.
customer_reviews.text: Parts of the hood had scratches and dents , but in the area that would be covered by the cabinet after installation so I didn't return it. The stainless steal is a bit on the thinner side, which lead to a rattling sound after installation. I was able to stop the rattling by pushing pieces of foam in the small gap between the bottom of the cabinet and the top of the hood. If the metal were thicker, I believe this would not be necessary. The hood itself does a good job venting steam and smoke outside. The baffle filters are effective, and I've put them through the dishwasher without any issues. The LED lights have been useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Impossible
customer_reviews.text: This hood fan does the impossible. On high it is still quiet and you can literally see the cooking smoke & smell swirl up and out through the range hood. It has 2 LED lights which provide convenient and more than adequate lighting. This is a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blowout DVD

customer_reviews.title: Nice design...works well...competitive  price
customer_reviews.text: We love the unit so far. We have not had to clean anything yet, so can't speak to that.....but very happy with our choice at this point.
customer_reviews.author: genogeno

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great unit for the price! It competes, if not blows away, the high end guys. It has amazing suction it's like I'm on an airfield :) I browse high end units and they don't even move the air nearly as much as this does. We have been using it for months since remodeling our kitchen and love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Y Sheppley

customer_reviews.title: Solid vent. Plan well for installation.
customer_reviews.text: Solid vent. Very quite when runs at low speed. But very powerful when runs at full speed. The lights are bright enough for cooking. Get prepared for some work if you want to install it on your own. The planning, designing, and installation took me 6-7 hours. But worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shi

customer_reviews.title: I just wish you could turn off the annoying loud "BEEP
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. No more smoke alarms going off when I cook steak! The light is bright, the fans are powerful, I just wish you could turn off the annoying loud "BEEP!" every time you press a button.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy but does the job! Really powerful exhaust vent. Looks nice! And durable
customer_reviews.author: tino

customer_reviews.title: why the installation needs to be so difficult
customer_reviews.text: 1) The machine is working as expected. however the installation is so hard. In order to get the 4 screws in the correct place, it took me lots of un-necessary effort. don't understand why there is no improvement in this key aspect. 2) the light is not as bright as I expected. nobody cares about saving energy on this stuff. 2W LED seems too dark for cooking. It is also hard to find the replacement bulb, isn't it?
customer_reviews.author: Tenniser

customer_reviews.title: A very well made, heavy duty outfit, a ...
customer_reviews.text: A very well made, heavy duty outfit, a little spendy, but you get what you pay for. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Albert T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome range hood.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, well built range hood. We’re doing a remodel and the contractor doing the work said that he was so impressed with the hood that he was going to buy one for his own home.
customer_reviews.author: William B

customer_reviews.title: This is powerful and cost-effective range hood for Chinese food
customer_reviews.text: I'm Chinese, after comparison on price and power airflow, I choose the cost-effective range hood, after installed and have 2 week usage experience, I write review as following: (1). This is real high cost performance hood, work very good for Chinese food. (2). As the installation guide said, a minimum of 6'' round duct must be used to maintain maximum airflow efficiency, if use 4'' duct, the hood work so poor. (3) The baffle filters have lot of scratch as image attached when I received, I think it was not brand-new, and I ask to exchange the baffle filters.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hood! Quiet and powerful at same time
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hood! Quiet and powerful at same time. If your cooking involves lots of pan frying, like our family ( we are Chinese), look no further, this is the one much better than those expensive Asian brands hood!
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: no complaint love it great price I have work in commercial kitchens ...
customer_reviews.text: no complaint love it great price I have work in commercial kitchens for 34 years as the head chef and this is working great at my home.
customer_reviews.author: dominique a fontenille

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, lights are BRIGHT, moves a ton of air and not too much cussing on the install.
customer_reviews.text: This looks so much better than the 80's track house hood I had before. I really like the lights, they bring daylight to the stove top. I doubt it moves 900 CFM with the filter baffles in, but it has kept up with my cooking so far. The installation was not as hard as I thought it would be. Make sure you have foil tape.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Johanningsmeier

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great! Annoying beep.
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks great. My only complaint, and it is a nit, is the annoying beep that you get everytime you press the light or exhaust fan buttons. Oh, and maybe the light could be a little brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Anthony Barber

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made, powerful, the noise level is low, looks good, and the price is decent. The only reason i took one star off is a bit too narrow for a 30 inch range hood. The actual size is 29 1⁄2 inches, which means a 1/4 inch gap will remain on each side if you are installing under a standard 30 inch cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Good for Asian family !
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product, it has 3 speed fan control, LED light, up to 870 CFM, this model is big enough for Asian family cooking. Good price and Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Icecream Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very nice range hood
customer_reviews.text: Very nice range hood. Easy to clean, great features. Seller responded me fast when I request an owner's manual (pdf file) they sent to me within minutes. I have recommended this hood to quite a few friends already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great fan at a reasonable price. Delivered quickly. My only complaint is that it is a little difficult to install with the slotted screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: jlcrawford

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse thing i have ever purchased! it doesnt work at all! I spent like $100 to have someone professional to install it for me, and this product doesn't work at all, the whole house was filled with smokes. My hair, my house, and my clothes are filled with odor. my throat was feeling itchy by breathing in all those smoke. btw, i am pregnant and i got a 6 years old boy with me, i am worried! i had to warn all of you that are planning of purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: labotella

customer_reviews.title: Operators manual is pitiful. Need specifications on loss of ...
customer_reviews.text: Operators manual is pitiful. Need specifications on loss of CFM with length of vent pipe and specifications for roof vent cap. Info on replacing LED lights is pitiful. "Don't pull the plug with a wet hand". "25 2/3" hob". You need to get an American to write the operators manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great range, hate engraved BV logo
customer_reviews.text: I really like everything about this range hood except for one reason and it's a minor reason. I don't like the engraved logo BV on the front of the hood. It was difficult to tell from the pictures online just how noticeable it would be once installed. It works great though. I'll probably get over the aesthetics in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: stlmom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the value price. Just need to add backsplash now. Remember to remove the phone before turning on. Good luck on getting sticker off without residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good range, can do better check before shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent range, it sucks up all smoke and odor. Even at that speed its pretty quite. Why 4 star and not 5? I ordered it first and it came damaged. Upon contacting seller, they were happy to take it back. Then I ordered it again, as I really wanted this. This time it came with a dent on one side. Upon contacting seller, they said, it is ok to install this and they gave back some money for the dent. For seller: You have built a good product. Just do a thorough checkup before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bhuplesh G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy It. You’ll be Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Easy to install. Operates beautifully. Looks nice. No sharp edges to hit your head on (I’m tall). Product and service are as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerDrive

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great under cabinet Range hood. Do a lit of heavy cooking (ex: searing steaks, shallow frying, ect.) Does a good job a removing smoke and heat from kitchen. Baffle filters easy to remove so keeping up with cleaning is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Testing it before installation: 1 of the fan is ...
customer_reviews.text: Testing it before installation: 1 of the fan is touching the back panel of the housing making noises when spinning. I am returning this back!
customer_reviews.author: Hak

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It is noisy but it seems very well made and does a great job!! Better than a name brand I purchased at Lowes which broke and cost much more!
customer_reviews.author: ann picky

customer_reviews.title: The exhaust fan works awesome. I like the fact the filters can be ...
customer_reviews.text: The exhaust fan works awesome. I like the fact the filters can be put in dishwasher to clean, no need to spend money on replacing the filters. I like the buttons as opposed to flat service to operate it. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is because the lights are very dim. They do not put out much lighting, disappointed in that. But other than that it is a great exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.author: Cariss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, great addition to kitchen .....wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: TIM MABEE

customer_reviews.title: It is not easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fan and really does the job of removing Asian of orders from m our cooking.
customer_reviews.author: HT L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the amount of air that is sucked up. It literally blows ( or sucks ) everyone out of the water (or air). 😜 huge value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Longhurst

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, working very well
customer_reviews.text: everything is working perfectly, LED light is super bright. Easy to install since my old one have same measurement . Old one last twenty years and still working. Only reason replace it because it become rust and paint peel off. This shouldn't happen because it is stainless steel!
customer_reviews.author: stephen tang

customer_reviews.title: Good range hood to consider.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the money we paid! The delivery was on time and the hood was easy to install. It can be wall mounted as well as secured from the cabinet above the range with four bolts (which we did). Good three levels of suction, noise level is normal. Overall performance exceeded our expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BV Range Hood - 30 Inch 750 CFM Under Cabinet Stainless Steel Kitchen Range Hoods, Dishwasher Safe Baffle Filters w/LED Lights, Ducted Kitchen Exhaust Fan Hood (30 Inch - 750 CFM/RH-01)
product_meta.description: Style:30 Inch - 750 CFM/RH-01Easy to Disassemble for Cleaning This BV range hood is a high airflow ducted unit with lights and stainless steel baffle filters. The entire range hood is designed with easy removal and cleaning of parts, without specialized tools required. Patented “SLANTED ” Design Slanted housing provides effective, quiet airflow and provides full coverage of the entire cooking surface the fan sits over. 750CFM High Power and 7.5 Sones Low Noise The range hood provides up to 750 CFM while only outputting 7.5 sones at max fan speed. Specifications : Exact Dimensions (L-W-H): 29-3/4" x 22-1/20" x 7-1/4" to 8-1/20" Materials: Brushed Stainless Steel / Sheet Metal Power Rating: 120V/60Hz (ETL Certified) Total Input Power: 174W Motor Input Power: 170W L Levels of Speed Control: 3-speed electronic button control Number of Motors: 2 Fan Type: Aluminum Motor Fan Filtration Type: Stainless steel baffle filters Illumination: 2x 2W LED lights Vent Shutter Opening Size: 6-1/4 ” Shop with confidence BV is continuously improving and evolving for our customer needs. Our goal is your 100% satisfaction.We offer every customer a limited 2-year product warranty on every item purchased
feature_bullets: Powerful Airflow 750 CFM Greatly Reduces Cooking Smoke and Grease - Dual motors with high airflow up to 750 CFM can take away most cooking smoke and grease. Leave your kitchen clean with fresh air.
Provide Extra Lighting Aids in Prep Safety – With bright 2 watts Energy-Saver LED Lights, they will not only provide extra lighting to the space you cook in, but also aids in prep safety.
Easy-to-Clean and Dishwasher Safe Baffle Filters - Featured 430 stainless steel baffle filters. They are easy to remove and dishwasher safe!

Contemporary Design – Full body with 18 Gauge Stainless Steel Design provides a much modern look for your kitchen.Minimum Height Above Cook Top: 24 inches;Maximum Height Above Cook Top: 32 inches;Recommended Height About Cook Top: 27 inches to 30 inches.
Worry-free Guarantee ETL Rated. 2-year Product Warranty Protected - Backed by BV 30 days Money Back Guarantee with 2 years warranty.
